QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_RoofBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all occurrences of roof.

QtoDef.Name: GrossArea
QtoDef.Definition: Gross Area of the object. Openings, recesses, projections and cut-outs are not taken into account.

QtoDef.Name: NetArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total net area of the object. Openings, recesses and cut-outs are taken into account by subtraction, projections by addition.

QtoDef.Name: ProjectedArea
QtoDef.Definition: Total gross area of the outer surfaces of the roof, projected tp the ground. It is the sum of all projected roof slab gross areas. Roof openings, like sky windows and other openings and cut-outs are not taken into account.
